title: In Miniature Style II
description: Available in print and Ebook, different formats for Kindle/mobi, etc. With dozens of stunning photos, over 40 how-to projects, and profiles of talented miniaturists and their work, In Miniature Style II offers a creative tableau sure to please novice crafters and experienced collectors alike. Contains new profiles, many new photos, and even more unique, fun projects to try!Updated features, new photos & dozens of new how-to's including half-scale and miniature doll projects by IGMA artisans and other skilled miniaturists.Details and photos: http://cverstraete.com/dollhousebook_...
